item.title: Hugo meets Github Actions
item.description: Hugo is blazing fast framwork to build websites. Recently, I migrated my blog from ghost+ghost-buster to hugo and gh pages. I am assuming that you have git and hugo installed on your machine. Setting up git repositories - Github has two types of pages : - User or Organization pages - (e.g. https://<USERNAME|ORGANIZATION>.github.io) - Prject pages - (e.g. https://<USERNAME|ORGANIZATION>.github.io/<PROJECT-NAME>) Refer githu pages documentation for more information. Create a <hugo-blog> git repository which will contain Hugo website.
